'Giants' is the fourth studio album by British electronic dance music artist
Chicane. It was released in the United Kingdom on August 2, 2010. The album's
first official single, "Middledistancerunner", featuring the vocals of Adam
Young was released on the same day. The tracks "Poppiholla", "Hiding All the
Stars" and "Come Back", which were supposed to be released on a Re-work EP back
in 2009, are also included on the album. The album debuted at #35 on the UK
Albums Chart and at #2 on the UK Dance Albums Chart on August 8, 2010.
